author: djrtwo
content:
what's the status of enabling multi-addrs for discv5 connections? 
I know <@!498009160982724610> was able to do it in rust. Is there support in other languages yet?

author: djrtwo
content: being able to make initial connection to node's discv5 via providing a (human readable) multi-addr. Given the pubkey embedded in the multi-addr it is feasible with the discv5 protocol and makes for easier manual management of bootnodes and other things

author: djrtwo
content:
we discussed this at length in a previous eth2 call and they just implemented it in rust
curious if this is on anyone elses radar

author: prestonvanloon
content: oh, i am pretty sure we have this as well
